about_the_game:
The original soundtrack for the game "Death By Frostbyte," composed and produced by Gōst Pepper. The soundtrack uses cold, icy synths and strings to capture the aesthetic of the frozen wasteland of "Death By Frostbyte" as well as industrial sounds to highlight the themes of the game and the struggle to survive in an unforgiving climate.

All tracks composed, recorded, and produced by Gōst Pepper. Additional performances by Mia Asano on violin and electric violin, and Kelsey Blackstone on cello.
